elements.title: Homestead Moinho do Corisco Aljezur - cork oaks (Provenda)
elements.contents:
€ 2.900.000
Homestead Moinho do Corisco Aljezur - cork oaks
prev
next
674m²  380.250m²REF PV-T-569

Sale
Property located in a quiet area, with easy access through natural vegetation, pine trees and cork oaks. The Estate has harmonious landscapes - hills, valleys, plateaus - as well as a beautiful Natural Lake. There are 3 old houses (to be rebuilt), in different areas of the property. Come visit this Property and enjoy what nature offers us.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: House 2 bedrooms Old Travessa da Palmeira Aljezur - backyard (Provenda)
elements.contents:
€ 230.000
House 2 bedrooms Old Travessa da Palmeira Aljezur - backyard
prev
next
67m²  97m²REF PV-M-570

Sale
Old House with Yard, located in Aljezur in the Igreja Nova area. Its location is central and easily accessible, and we are naturally driven to walk, discover and enjoy this place. This house has good sun exposure, which benefits the outdoor patio, a corner reserved for leisure moments. It consists of a hall, 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen and bathroom. Supplied with electricity and water of the public network.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: Land Rustic with 18750sqm Azia De Cima Rogil Aljezur - electricity, water, fruit trees, water hole (Provenda)
elements.contents:
€ 75.000
Land Rustic with 18750sqm Azia De Cima Rogil Aljezur - electricity, water, fruit trees, water hole
prev
next
18.750m²REF PV-T-566

Sale
Rustic land, located in a pleasant area with easy access. With a warehouse of 7sqm, approved by the authorities, electricity, water supply through the network and from an existing borehole . Currently there is a vegetable garden on this Property as well as several fruit trees and old vines. The soil is sandy and fertile.

elements.title: House 3 bedrooms Aljezur - terrace (Provenda)
elements.contents:
€ 470.000
House 3 bedrooms Aljezur - terrace
prev
next
73m²  105m²REF PV-M-566

Sale
House located in the village of Aljezur, overlooking the wonderful landscape of the green meadow, the Igreja Nova and the Serra de Monchique Mountains. With easy access, both on foot and by car, it is possible to park next to the house. The house consists of 3 bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom, entrance hall and a pleasant outdoor terrace.

elements.title: House 4 bedrooms Maria Vinagre Rogil Aljezur - garden, garage (Provenda)
elements.contents:
€ 295.000
House 4 bedrooms Maria Vinagre Rogil Aljezur - garden, garage
prev
next
154,90m²  240m²REF PV-M-556

Sale
House located in the small and quiet village of Maria Vinagre, close to Aljezur and the Atlantic Coast. With easy access, you can use the garage as well as public parking. As the Housing is adjacent to 2 streets, it has 2 independent entrances (from the main door street and from the garden street). This House has an excellent use of spaces, the construction level is in good condition. Come and let's visit it with us!
Add to Favorites

elements.title: Villa 2 bedrooms Vale da Telha Aljezur - terrace, terraces, quiet area, garage, garden (Provenda)
elements.contents:
€ 330.000
Villa 2 bedrooms Vale da Telha Aljezur - terrace, terraces, quiet area, garage, garden
prev
next
Sold
126m²  720m²REF PV-562

Sale
Villa located in a quiet, pleasant and relaxing area. Our senses awaken, we have a perfect sense of the presence and proximity of the Ocean, This House consists of a Living Room, living and dining area together, Kitchen, 1 WC, 2 Bedrooms, Garage and outdoor terraces. With excellent solar orientation, it is possible to promote different spaces for socializing in the garden. Close to the beaches of Monte Clérigo, Arrifana, Amoreira and others of the Costa Vicentina Natural Park.

elements.title: Building 5 bedrooms Odeceixe Aljezur (Provenda)
elements.contents:
€ 430.000
Building 5 bedrooms Odeceixe Aljezur
prev
next
161m²REF PV-M-563

Sale
Recently renovated building, located in the beautiful village of Odeceixe. Consists of 2 apartments, fully equipped. It is worth mentioning the wonderful Rooftop, 360º of unique landscape - the village, the cultivated fields, the River, the Mountains and the Sea. A short distance from the center of Odeceixe where there are all the local amenities and the beautiful Odeceixe beach. Unique opportunity to live in this peaceful village.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: Farm 5 bedrooms Bordeira Aljezur - garden, swimming pool (Provenda)
elements.contents:
€ 1.950.000
Farm 5 bedrooms Bordeira Aljezur - garden, swimming pool
prev
next
Sold
416,66m²  39.300m²REF PV-T-561

Sale
Property of 3.9Ha surrounded by trees, an ideal getaway home with fantastic views. Consisting of 3 separate buildings with 416.66sqm of total area. It is divided by Main house, Guest house and Annex. Nice sun exposure, includes a biological swimming pool set in a Mediterranean garden, a workshop for general use and a car park. The property is currently operated as a successful Rural Tourism of 3-bedroom plus a 2-bedroom owner's residence, but is equally suitable for use as a luxury family residence or holiday home. Lagos is 20 minutes’ drive and golf courses of the south coast within easy reach. Faro airport is only 1 hour away by car.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: Land Rustic with 48420sqm Corte de Sobro Aljezur - electricity, water, easy access (Provenda)
elements.contents:
€ 195.000
Land Rustic with 48420sqm Corte de Sobro Aljezur - electricity, water, easy access
prev
next
48.420m²REF PV-T-559

Sale
Rustic land bordering a water stream, located on the Costa Vicentina, great for agriculture. It has 3 ponds, one of them with around 100x50m, with spring water suitable for bathing (analyses carried out by Int. Sup. Tecnico), flanked by pine trees and plains. Good access. Electricity and water from the company nearby. 3.5 km from Rogil, 5 km from Vale dos Homens Beach and 7 km from Aljezur. Highlight for the panoramic views of sea and mountains. Distinguished by the enormous variety of birds that can be observed, or as a simple place of leisure and rest.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

Beautiful property with 1514m², located in Costa Vicentina, 5 km away from the beach of Vale Figueiras, with approved project to build a 2 storey house with total area of 200m² and swimming pool. Upper floor with 111.93m², composed by living room and kitchen in open space, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and storage room. Lower floor with 87.86m² composed by technical area, WC and garage. Large terraces and swimming pool with 30m².
